name: The Desert(PROTOTYPE)
description:
The first of four intertwined CreateOCon Studios. dream sequence games.

STORY
The Desert is a vague open-world exploration game inspired by "Myst" and "Shadow of the Colossus". The game takes place in an uninhabited desert, in which the player must explore at there own will to discover the history of the desert's's design. The Desert holds many architectural wonders that tell a story of a forgotten land; your existence in said land is the mystery that the player must find.

The player assumes the role of an unidentified figure, who has been exiled from an unspecified kingdom for crimes he/she did not commit.(The lore will fill the story in... and will be updated constantly)

DESIGN PHILOSOPHY
The Desert was designed with the intention of creating a very casual and soothing exploration experience; with that in mind, there is no action... only story and mystery. It's a pretty simple game.

FEATURES
-Open-World Exploration
-Object Touch Interactions
-First-Person Controls(Not Point and Click)
-In-Game Lore(More to come)

THE DESERT WAS THE FIRST GAME IN A FOUR PART INDIRECT SERIES.

THE PROCESS OF BEING REBOOTING THE SERIES HAS BEEN CANCELLED.

FOR MORE INFO: http://createocon.us

A Michael T Moreno Game.

Original Release Date: Sept 7,2013
